name: Color Crush: a puzzle game about matching 3 bubbles or more with the same color
name_original: Color Crush: a puzzle game about matching 3 bubbles or more with the same color
description:
The task is simple: explode as many same-colored dots as you can.

Get competitive by connecting Facebook to see your friends' scores on the High Scores list and prove that you are better at Color Crush than your friends with the weekly tournament.
